Jonathan Zerez Mechanical Engineering C/O 2021 I'm a student at the Olin College of Engineering. This website is a brief showcasing of some of the various projects I've worked on

Project Categories

Mechanical
Optimum J : Simulation based optimization for automatic generation of vehicle suspension geometry
FSAE Anti Roll Bar : I designed the Anti-Roll bars for the 2018-2019 Olin Electric Motorsports Racecar (FSAE)
CNC Stringart : A 2 axis CNC String art machine
Inverted Pendulum PID : Implemented a PID controller to keep segway-like robot standing
FSAE Suspension And Chassis : I helped to design and fabricate the suspension and chassis for the 2018-2019 Olin Electric Motorsports Racecar (FSAE)
FSAE Accelerator Pedal : I designed and fabricated the accelerator pedal for the 2018-2019 Olin Electric Motorsports Racecar (FSAE)
Software
Sponsor Tool : A web crawler that finds emails of potential sponsors for the Formula SAE team at Olin
Pixel Sorting : A computational art project to make images look [G L I T C H Y]
Swarm Classification : A project about using an Ant Colony Algorithm to classify sets of data
Improving Bike Networks : A project to investigate strategies to best improve transportation networks
Optimum J : Simulation based optimization for automatic generation of vehicle suspension geometry
3D Mouse Mobile App : A project that turns a phone into a 3D mouse for Solidworks!
Neato Slam : A SLAM algorithm for a 2D LIDAR enabled robot
CNC Stringart : A 2 axis CNC String art machine
Inverted Pendulum PID : Implemented a PID controller to keep segway-like robot standing
Music Mashups : A digital signal processing project to join the vocals of one song to instrumentals of another
Flat Earth Physics : Have you ever wondered what it'd be like to throw a ball on flat earth?
